name: 🔧 Debug & Monitor System
description: Debug automation system with detailed logging and Telegram monitoring alerts

configuration.keywords: test, debug, monitor, flowbot, automation, zap

configuration.prompt:
🔧 **DEBUG SYSTEM ANALYSIS**

Analyze this email for debugging and monitoring:

🔍 **EMAIL TYPE**: Debug-Test/Monitor-Alert/User-Feedback/System-Log/Other
⚙️ **AUTOMATION STATUS**: Working/Broken/Needs-Attention/Unknown
📊 **LOG LEVEL**: Critical/Warning/Info/Debug/Trace
🎯 **ACTION NEEDED**: Immediate/Review/Log-Only/No-Action

📝 **DEBUG SUMMARY**:
[Provide technical summary of the issue or test result]

🔧 **TECHNICAL DETAILS**:
[Any error messages, stack traces, or system information]

✅ **NEXT STEPS**:
[What should developers or admins do next]

If this is not related to debugging or monitoring, respond: 'SKIP: Not a debug/monitor email'

metadata.description_extended: This Zap is specifically designed for developers and system administrators to monitor and debug FlowBot automation systems. It provides detailed technical information and logs to Telegram for real-time monitoring of system health and automation performance.
